encounter.description: foreign key to the encounter when the allergy was diagnosed.
encounter.name: encounter

start.description: the date the allergy was diagnosed.
start.name: start

stop.description: the date the allergy ended, if applicable.
stop.name: stop

careplans.table_description: patient care plan data, including goals.

encounter.description: foreign key to the encounter when the care plan was initiated.
encounter.name: encounter

id.description: primary key. unique identifier of the care plan.
id.name: id

reasoncode.description: diagnosis code from snomed-ct that this care plan addresses.
reasoncode.name: reasoncode

start.description: the date the care plan was initiated.
start.name: start

stop.description: the date the care plan ended, if applicable.
stop.name: stop

encounter.description: foreign key to the encounter when the condition was diagnosed.
encounter.name: encounter

start.description: the date the condition was diagnosed.
start.name: start

stop.description: the date the condition resolved, if applicable.
stop.name: stop

cost.description: the base cost of the encounter, not including any line item costs related to medications, immunizations, procedures, or other services.
cost.name: cost

description.description: description of the type of encounter.
description.name: description

encounterclass.description: the class of the encounter, such as ambulatory, emergency, inpatient, wellness, or urgentcare
encounterclass.name: encounterclass

id.description: primary key. unique identifier of the encounter.
id.name: id

reasoncode.description: diagnosis code from snomed-ct, only if this encounter targeted a specific condition.
reasoncode.name: reasoncode

start.description: the date and time the encounter started.
start.name: start

stop.description: the date and time the encounter concluded.
stop.name: stop

body site code.description: a snomed body structures code describing what part of the body the images in the series were taken of.
body site code.name: body site code

date.description: the date the imaging study was conducted.
date.name: date

encounter.description: foreign key to the encounter where the imaging study was conducted.
encounter.name: encounter

id.description: primary key. unique identifier of the imaging study.
id.name: id

modality code.description: a dicom-dcm code describing the method used to take the images.
modality code.name: modality code

sop code.description: a dicom-sop code describing the subject-object pair (sop) that constitutes the image.
sop code.name: sop code

cost.description: the line item cost of the immunization.
cost.name: cost

date.description: the date the immunization was administered.
date.name: date

encounter.description: foreign key to the encounter where the immunization was administered.
encounter.name: encounter

cost.description: the line item cost of the medication.
cost.name: cost

encounter.description: foreign key to the encounter where the medication was prescribed.
encounter.name: encounter

reasoncode.description: diagnosis code from snomed-ct specifying why this medication was prescribed.
reasoncode.name: reasoncode

start.description: the date the medication was prescribed.
start.name: start

stop.description: the date the prescription ended, if applicable.
stop.name: stop

observations.table_description: patient observations including vital signs and lab reports.

code.description: observation or lab code from loinc
code.name: code

date.description: the date the observation was performed.
date.name: date

description.description: description of the observation or lab.
description.name: description

encounter.description: foreign key to the encounter where the observation was performed.
encounter.name: encounter

type.description: the datatype of value text or numeric.
type.name: type

units.description: the units of measure for the value.
units.name: units

value.description: the recorded value of the observation.
value.name: value

address.description: organization's street address without commas or newlines.
address.name: address

utilization.description: the number of encounter's performed by this organization.
utilization.name: utilization

zip.description: street address zip or postal code.
zip.name: zip

address.description: patient's street address without commas or newlines.
address.name: address

birthdate.description: the date the patient was born.
birthdate.name: birthdate

birthplace.description: name of the town where the patient was born.
birthplace.name: birthplace

ethnicity.description: description of the patient's primary ethnicity.
ethnicity.name: ethnicity

gender.description: gender. m is male, f is female.
gender.name: gender

id.description: primary key. unique identifier of the patient.
id.name: id

last.description: last or surname of the patient.
last.name: last

marital.description: marital status. m is married, s is single. currently no support for divorce (d) or widowing (w)
marital.name: marital

prefix.description: name prefix, such as mr., mrs., dr., etc.
prefix.name: prefix

race.description: description of the patient's primary race.
race.name: race

suffix.description: name suffix, such as phd, md, jd, etc.
suffix.name: suffix

cost.description: the line item cost of the procedure.
cost.name: cost

date.description: the date the procedure was performed.
date.name: date

encounter.description: foreign key to the encounter where the procedure was performed.
encounter.name: encounter

reasoncode.description: diagnosis code from snomed-ct specifying why this procedure was performed.
reasoncode.name: reasoncode

address.description: provider's street address without commas or newlines.
address.name: address

gender.description: gender. m is male, f is female.
gender.name: gender

name.description: first and last name of the provider.
name.name: name

organization.description: foreign key to the organization that employees this provider.
organization.name: organization

utilization.description: the number of encounter's performed by this provider.
utilization.name: utilization

zip.description: street address zip or postal code.
zip.name: zip
